attributes.action: make it against the law for landlords to refuse to lease their propertys to people simply because they are recieving benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many of the flats and houses in england are empty, many people on benefits find it hard to find landlords who will except them as tenents simply because they recieve state benefits, landlords should have rights regarding damage to their propertys and unruly tenants
but to discriminate against people who are on benifits is madness  when so many people in england are homeless
